name: Aeon Chronicler
text:
Aeon Chronicler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Suspend X—{X}{3}{U}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{3}{U} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Aeon Chronicler while it's exiled, draw a card.

flavor:
"When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."
—Jazal Goldmane
name: Ajani's Pridemate
text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

flavor: The people of Amrou were scattered by war and driven into hiding. Scouts maintain the beacon fires that signal "return" and "home."
name: Amrou Scout
text: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

flavor: The paradise of Amrou Haven had become a field of cinders. Its people struggled to survive, hoping to see visions of its past in the strange storms that quickly passed.
name: Amrou Seekers
text: Amrou Seekers can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.

name: Angel of Salvation
text:
Flash; convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
When Angel of Salvation enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.

name: Angel's Grace
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
You can't lose the game this turn and your opponents can't win the game this turn. Until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

flavor: The rulers of old Dominaria kept assassins on retainer. However, the true loyalty of these master killers was always their peers. This elite community survived the fall of the old royal order.
name: Assassinate
text: Destroy target tapped creature.

name: Aven Mindcensor
text:
Flash
Flying
If an opponent would search a library, that player searches the top four cards of that library instead.

name: Aven Riftwatcher
text:
Flying
Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Aven Riftwatcher enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

name: Banishing Light
text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

flavor: "The echo of silence is music to my ears."
name: Baral, Chief of Compliance
text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

name: Benalish Commander
text:
Benalish Commander's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Soldiers you control.
Suspend X—{X}{W}{W}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{W}{W} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Benalish Commander while it's exiled, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

name: Big Game Hunter
text:
When Big Game Hunter enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

flavor: One croaked sermon spreads propaganda and plague.
name: Blightspeaker
text:
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

flavor: A well-made homunculus grooms the mind of its master, pruning the thoughts that lead to madness. Few loredelvers survive the study of the infinite without one.
name: Bonded Fetch
text:
Defender, haste
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

flavor: A fight put off forever is already won.
name: Bound in Silence
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

flavor: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.
name: Brine Elemental
text:
Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips their next untap step.

flavor:
"Sages who take the time to verify their sources are rewarded for their diligence."
—Jhoira, to Teferi
name: Careful Consideration
text: Target player draws four cards, then discards three cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead that player draws four cards, then discards two cards.

name: Celestial Crusader

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

text:
Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

text:
Flying
{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token named Cloud Sprite. It has flying and "Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying."

flavor: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.
name: Containment Priest
text:
Flash
If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Crovax, Ascendant Hero
text:
Other white creatures get +1/+1.
Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1.

text: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

flavor: The vedalken know it is not of this world, so they know that this world is not the only one.
name: Crystal Shard
text: {3}, {T} or {U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

flavor: Her blades slashed across the noble's shadow. He scoffed, then fell over dead.
name: Cutthroat il-Dal
text: Hellbent — Cutthroat il-Dal has shadow as long as you have no cards in hand. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

text: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, the player plays it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

flavor: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."
name: Disdainful Stroke
text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

flavor:
"You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere."
—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane
name: Dismember
text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

flavor: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.
name: Dread Return
text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

flavor: What happens when it is the dream that wakes and the sleeper that fades into memory?
name: Dream Stalker
text: When Dream Stalker enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

flavor: They study the deeds of their traitorous ancestors, hoping the stories may reveal a way back to the physical world.
name: Drifter il-Dal
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Drifter il-Dal unless you pay {U}.

Protection from green

Enchant creature

name: Pit Keeper

flavor: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.
name: Return to Dust
text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

name: Riftmarked Knight
text:
Protection from black; flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
Suspend 3—{1}{W}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
When the last time counter is removed from Riftmarked Knight while it's exiled, create a 2/2 black Knight creature token with flanking, protection from white, and haste.

name: Riptide Pilferer
text:
Whenever Riptide Pilferer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

flavor: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.
name: Saltblast
text: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.

flavor: He remembers a past of light and healing. But he lives the bitter present—parching salt, scouring wind, and the withering heat of the desert.
name: Saltfield Recluse
text: {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

flavor: "O sangue é constante. Para cada gota que eu bebo, alguém precisa sangrar." — Vradeen, vampiro noctívago
name: Sanguine Bond
text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

flavor:
"A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical."
—Brudiclad, Telchor engineer
name: Sarcomite Myr
text:
{2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.

name: Sengir Nosferatu
text:
Flying
{1}{B}, Exile Sengir Nosferatu: Create a 1/2 black Bat creature token with flying. It has "{1}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Return an exiled card named Sengir Nosferatu to the battlefield under its owner's control."

name: Serra Avenger
text:
You can't cast this spell during your first, second, or third turns of the game.
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

name: Shaper Parasite
text:
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Shaper Parasite is turned face up, target creature gets +2/-2 or -2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Shriekmaw
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

flavor: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.
name: Sigil of the Empty Throne
text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

flavor:
"Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins."
—Cleph, Order of Redeemed Souls
name: Silence
text: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn. (Spells cast before this resolves are unaffected.)

flavor: As the muscle cords of the creature twitched, Hanna saw an unsettling unanimity in the others' rippling flesh. She didn't know what it meant, but she urged Sisay to keep the ship at a safe distance.
name: Sinew Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.

flavor: Death is only the beginning of the end.
name: Slaughter Pact
text:
Destroy target nonblack creature.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.

flavor:
"Great losses often bring only a numb shock. To truly plunge a victim into misery, you must overwhelm him with many small sufferings."
—Ratadrabik of Urborg
name: Smallpox
text: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

flavor:
"If it returns years hence, our knowledge of how to combat it will be that much greater."
—Andorel, Tolarian sentinel
name: Snapback
text:
You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Spell Burst
text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell with converted mana cost X.

flavor: Drakelings fish with their tails, angling to snare succulent thoughts and memories on their psychic hooks.
name: Spiketail Drakeling
text:
Flying
Sacrifice Spiketail Drakeling: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

flavor: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"
name: Sram, Senior Edificer
text: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

name: Stonecloaker
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
When Stonecloaker enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
When Stonecloaker enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

flavor: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.
name: Stonehorn Dignitary
text: When Stonehorn Dignitary enters the battlefield, target opponent skips their next combat phase.

name: Stormfront Riders
text:
Flying
When Stormfront Riders enters the battlefield, return two creatures you control to their owner's hand.
Whenever Stormfront Riders or another creature is returned to your hand from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

flavor:
"What good is your blade without your breath?"
—Greht, Gathan warlord
name: Strangling Soot
text:
Destroy target creature with toughness 3 or less.
Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

flavor: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.
name: Street Wraith
text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

flavor: In the stronghold's dungeons, the shadows hide in the vermin.
name: Stronghold Rats
text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Stronghold Rats deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card.

name: Stuffy Doll
text:
Indestructible
As Stuffy Doll enters the battlefield, choose a player.
Whenever Stuffy Doll is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to the chosen player.
{T}: Stuffy Doll deals 1 damage to itself.

flavor: Some mages tapped into the time rifts, forcing upon others alternate timelines in which unimaginable horrors befall them.
name: Sudden Death
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

name: Sudden Spoiling
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Until end of turn, creatures target player controls lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 0/2.

flavor:
"It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power."
—Orim, Samite inquisitor
name: Sunlance
text: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.

flavor: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"
name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

name: Tasigur, the Golden Fang
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
{2}{G/U}{G/U}: Mill two cards, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: To save this plane, he must forsake all others.
name: Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield have flash.
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.

name: Temporal Isolation
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shadow. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

flavor:
"Even swamps need sustenance. We will give it to them, and in turn, they will sustain us."
—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours
name: Tendrils of Corruption
text: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

flavor:
"Great books are meant to be read, then read again backwards or upside down!"
—Ettovard, Tolarian archivist
name: Think Twice
text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

flavor: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."
name: Thoughtseize
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

flavor: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."
name: Thraben Inspector
text: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

flavor: "It is not just our people I try to rescue. It is our culture, and our hope that we can return to greatness."
name: Tolarian Sentinel
text:
Flying
{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

name: Tombstalker
text:
Flying
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

flavor: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.
name: Treasure Cruise
text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.

name: Trinket Mage
text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: True-Name Nemesis
text:
As True-Name Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player.
True-Name Nemesis has protection from the chosen player. (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything controlled by that player.)

flavor: "I have become a gourmet of sorts. Each soul has its own distinctive flavor. The art is in inviting the right company to the feast."
name: Urborg Syphon-Mage
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each other player loses 2 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

flavor: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.
name: Vampire Hexmage
text:
First strike
Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

flavor: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.
name: Venser, Shaper Savant
text:
Flash
When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Vesuvan Shapeshifter
text:
As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down."
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Walk the Aeons
text:
Buyback—Sacrifice three Islands. (You may sacrifice three Islands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

flavor:
"I have spied them, wandering and watching—but for what? I fear they watch for us."
—Yonat of Amrou
name: Watcher Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +0/+2.

flavor: An eyeblink later, all that remained of the tree-beast was the breeze of its momentum.
name: Wipe Away
text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Yawgmoth, Thran Physician
text:
Protection from Humans
Pay 1 life, Sacrifice another creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature and draw a card.
{B}{B}, Discard a card: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

flavor: "I have an eternity to know the souls who are bound here, to behold their every facet. But moments from now they will be gagged and masked, and they shall be known by none other."
name: Yixlid Jailer
text: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.

flavor: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now *that's* dangerous."
name: Zulaport Cutthroat
text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
